name: Explosive Hopscotch
description:
Tap the moving tiles to destroy them with explosions! Lots of explosions !!!

 Features

-21 levels of progressive difficulty

-Low poly graphics.

-Explosions!!! 

How to play

- Use only one finger per tile.

- Be fast and accurate.

- Tap all tiles in a row at the same time.

Download here the Itch.io version(without ads) or from Google Play (whit some Ads)

Enjoy!!
